org.xbib.marc

Class Marc

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.xbib.marc.Marc

  • public final class Marc
extends java.lang.Object
    A MARC instance for top-level fluent API style access to the most viable methods of parsing, converting, transforming ISO 2709 and XML input streams.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  Marc.Builder
      A builder for MARC field streams, MARC records, and XML.
      static class  Marc.MarcIso2709Reader
      Read from a ISO 2709 stream and emit SAX events.
      static class  Marc.MarcXmlReader
      A XML reader for MARC XML.

      • wrapFields

        public int wrapFields(ChunkStream<byte[],BytesReference> stream,
                      boolean withCollection)
               throws java.io.IOException
        Pass a given chunk stream to a MARC generator, chunk by chunk. Can process any MARC streams, not only separator streams.
        Parameters:
        stream - a chunk stream
        withCollection - true if stream should be wrapped into a collection element
        Returns:
        the number of chunks in the stream
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if chunk reading fails

      • wrapRecords

        public long wrapRecords(ChunkStream<byte[],BytesReference> stream,
                        boolean withCollection)
                 throws java.io.IOException
        Wrap records into a collection. Can process any MARC streams, not only separator streams.
        Parameters:
        stream - a chunk stream
        withCollection - true if collection elements should be used, false if not
        Returns:
        the number of chunks in the stream
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if chunk reading fails
